column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////For cocktails we tried the Rosa
column3: and an Espresso Martini. All DELICIOUS! For an appetizer
column4: we enjoyed fresh East Coast Oysters. Moving to dinner
column5: we indulged in a Porterhouse (not on the menu but a special for the evening)
column6: alongside Brussel Sprouts and Mashed Potatoes. And no perfect birthday dinner would be complete without dessert! So we went with the Carrot Cake (so good ).
